CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Accep.name: CharlotteDunois\Validation\Rule\Accepted
CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Accep.short_desc:
Name: `accepted`
This rule ensures a specific field is accepted (value: `yes`, `on`, `1` or `true`).

validate.name: validate
validate.short_desc: This method validates the value using the rule's implementation.

CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Class.name: CharlotteDunois\Validation\Rule\ClassRule
CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Class.short_desc:
Name: `class` - Type Rule
This rule ensures a specific field is a string containing a valid class name or a class instance.
CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Class.long_desc:
The options value ensures the class is either of that type, or extending it or implementing it.
Usage: `class` or `class:CLASS_NAME`

CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Dimen.name: CharlotteDunois\Validation\Rule\Dimensions
CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Dimen.short_desc:
Name: `dimensions`
This rule ensures a specific upload field contains an image with the required dimensions. The following options exist: `min_width`, `min_height`, `width`, `height`, `max_width`, `max_height`, `ratio`.
CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Dimen.long_desc: Multiple options can be used using comma separators. Usage: `dimensions:OPTION=VALUE`

validate.name: validate

CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Max.name: CharlotteDunois\Validation\Rule\Max
CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Max.short_desc:
Name: `max`
This rule ensures a specific field is/has:
  - numeric: equal/smaller than the specified value
  - file: filesize is equal/smaller than the specified value (in kibibytes)
  - array: equal/less elements than specified value
  - string: equal/less characters than specified value

validate.name: validate
validate.short_desc: This method validates the value using the rule's implementation.

CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\MimeT.name: CharlotteDunois\Validation\Rule\MimeTypes
CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\MimeT.short_desc:
Name: `mimetypes`
This rule ensures a specific upload field is of specific mime type (comma separated). Valid options (examples): `image/*`, `*­/*`, `image/png`. Usage: `mimetypes:MIME_TYPE`

validate.name: validate
validate.short_desc: This method validates the value using the rule's implementation.

CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Min.name: CharlotteDunois\Validation\Rule\Min
CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Min.short_desc:

This rule ensures a specific field is/has:
  - numeric: equal/greater than the specified value
  - file: filesize is equal/greater than the specified value (in kibibytes)
  - array: equal/more elements than specified value
  - string: equal/more characters than specified value

validate.name: validate
validate.short_desc: This method validates the value using the rule's implementation.

CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Size.name: CharlotteDunois\Validation\Rule\Size
CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Rule\\Size.short_desc:
Name: `size`
This rule ensures a specific field is/has:
  - numeric: equal to the specified value
  - file: filesize is equal to the specified value (in kibibytes)

This rule ensures a specific field is all uppercase.

CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\ValidationR.name: CharlotteDunois\Validation\ValidationRule
CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\ValidationR.short_desc: The ValidationRule interface that every rule has to implement.

validate.name: validate
validate.short_desc: This method validates the value using the rule's implementation.

value.name: value
value.short_desc: The value of the field to validate.

exists.name: exists
exists.short_desc: If the field exists ($value is null on false).

CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Validator.name: CharlotteDunois\Validation\Validator
CharlotteDunois\\Validation\\Validator.long_desc: Type Rules are non-exclusive (that means specifying two type rules means either one is passing).

fails.name: fails
fails.short_desc: Determine if the data fails the validation rules.

language.name: language
language.short_desc: Return the error message based on the language key (language based).

fields.name: fields
fields.short_desc: The fields you wanna run the validation against.

lang.name: lang
lang.short_desc: The language for error messages (included are 'en' or 'de').

passes.name: passes
passes.short_desc: Determine if the data passes the validation rules.

throw.name: throw
throw.short_desc: Determines if the data passes the validation rules, or throws.
